properties.entry: INSERT ALL INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , USER_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , ? ) INTO CER_REPORT VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.CURRVAL , ? ) SELECT * FROM DUAL

INSERT ALL INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_FILE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , USER_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , ? ) INTO CER_REPORT VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.CURRVAL , ? ) SELECT * FROM DUAL

INSERT ALL INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_FILE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , USER_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , ? ) INTO CAFE_REPORT VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.CURRVAL , ? ) SELECT * FROM DUAL

SELECT RNUM , REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_FILE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , REPORT_STATUS , USER_ID FROM RELIST WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND REPORT_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_FILE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , REPORT_STATUS , USER_ID FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT_NO = ?
